questions.question: What is the ChEBI ID for acetylsalicylic acid?
questions.notes: Uses ChEBI database. Verified in chebi_exploration.md where aspirin/acetylsalicylic acid is CHEBI:15365. This tests chemical entity identifier precision in ontology databases.

questions.question: What is the HGNC identifier for BRCA1 gene?
questions.notes: Uses ClinVar database. Verified in clinvar_exploration.md where BRCA1 gene information showed HGNC:1100. This tests official gene nomenclature identifier retrieval requiring database access to standardized gene symbols.

questions.question: How many diseases in NANDO have notification numbers (government-designated intractable diseases)?
questions.notes: Uses NANDO database. Verified in nando_exploration.md which documented 2,454 of 2,777 diseases (88%) have government notification numbers. This tests specialized Japanese rare disease policy data completeness.

questions.question: List all positive enzyme activities for Bacillus subtilis according to BacDive.
questions.expected_answer: Caseinase, catalase, gamma-glutamyltransferase, protease, beta-galactosidase, alcohol dehydrogenase, gelatinase, amylase, DNase (9 total)
questions.notes: Uses BacDive database. Verified in bacdive_exploration.md where enzyme activities query showed B. subtilis has 9 different positive enzyme activities. This tests comprehensive phenotypic characterization requiring database access to metabolic profiles.

questions.question: What is the UniProt accession corresponding to Ensembl protein ENSP00000269305?
questions.notes: Uses Ensembl and UniProt databases. Verified in ensembl_exploration.md where gene-transcript-protein hierarchy showed TP53 proteins link to UniProt P04637 (canonical). This tests protein database integration across genome and proteome resources.

questions.question: What is the SNOMED CT identifier for Lipoatrophic diabetes from MedGen?
questions.notes: Uses MedGen database. Verified in medgen_exploration.md where external cross-references for C0011859 included SNOMED CT:127012008. This tests clinical terminology mapping across medical databases.

questions.question: How many 16S rRNA sequences are recorded in BacDive?
questions.notes: Uses BacDive database. Verified in bacdive_exploration.md which documented 87,045 total 16S sequences (~35% coverage). This tests current molecular sequence data availability statistics.

questions.question: How many diseases in MONDO have OMIM cross-references?
questions.notes: Uses MONDO database. Verified in mondo_exploration.md which documented OMIM cross-references at 33% coverage. This tests current disease ontology integration statistics with genetic disorder databases.

questions.question: What is the R-work value for PDB entry 5D8V?
questions.notes: Uses PDB database. Verified in pdb_exploration.md where ultra-high resolution structures showed 5D8V has R-work 0.072 at 0.48Å resolution. This tests specific crystallographic quality metric retrieval.

questions.question: What is the hiragana pronunciation label for Parkinson's disease in NANDO?
questions.notes: Uses NANDO database. Verified in nando_exploration.md which documented multilingual labels including hiragana pronunciation for diseases. This tests specialized Japanese linguistic data requiring database access to complete multilingual annotations.

questions.question: Find all aspirin-triggered resolvins in ChEBI.
questions.expected_answer: Multiple resolvins: D1 (CHEBI:138179), D2 (CHEBI:138614), D3 (CHEBI:138615), D4 (CHEBI:138616), D5 (CHEBI:138617), D6 (CHEBI:138618)
questions.notes: Uses ChEBI database. Verified in chebi_exploration.md where aspirin search found 10 aspirin-related entities including 6 aspirin-triggered resolvins. This tests hierarchical chemical derivative enumeration in ontology structures.

questions.question: Find all MediaDive culture media with pH between 6.5 and 7.5 that are marked as complex.
questions.expected_answer: Multiple neutral pH complex media including various anaerobic and methanogen media
questions.notes: Uses MediaDive database. Verified in mediadive_exploration.md where pH range filtering with complexity boolean found 15+ neutral pH media. This tests numeric range filtering combined with boolean property filtering.
